name: Monkii
description:
We're Monkii, one of Melbourne's leading digital agencies. Our experienced team helps connect brands and their audiences through strategic thinking, sharp ideas and beautiful designs. Some of us are also legends on Guitar Hero. Monkii’s passion for creative and innovative problem solving shows in all that we do. Our work runs the gamut of online, from digital strategy through to UX, web design, eCommerce and web development.
We’ve built beautiful boutique websites for small creative businesses as well as some of the largest enterprise grade Drupal websites in Australia for prominent and important organisations. We’re also dab hands in mobile development, building much loved apps (some featured by Apple themselves) that are used by thousands of people every day.
READ MORE...
